```{r setup, include = FALSE}
options(stringsAsFactors = FALSE)
knitr::opts_chunk$set(
  results = "asis", 
  eval = TRUE, 
  echo = FALSE, 
  message = FALSE, 
  error = FALSE, 
  warning = FALSE
)
source("R/cv.R")
```

```{r}
cat(
```
